All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main App for interacting with MOBLIMA
BookingUI
Boundary class providing the Booking related User Interface for Customer.
Cinema
Represents a Cinema in the system It contains movies, prices of the movies, showtimes, seats and seat layout
CinemaController
Controller for cinema.
Cineplex
Represents a Cineplex with 3 different Cinema in the system
Client
Represents an interface for Clients To be inherited by Staff and Customer
ClientController
class to control reading/writing from database for customer + staff
Customer
Represents a Customer/Movie-goer in the system Contains all relevant Customer's information such as name, age, username, password, mobile number, email, etc.
DataCreator
Controller that creates the initial database
HolidayController
Controller managing the Holidays in the database
Movie
Represents a Movie in the system Contains all relevant information of a Movie
MovieController
Controller for Movie entity
MovieListing
Boundary class providing the Movie Listing related User Interface
MovieStatus
Enum of Movie status
MovieType
Enum of Movie types
Review
Represents a Review in the system
Seat
Represents a Seat a Cinema
SeatType
Enum of Seat types
SessionController
Controller for managing the Session between Customers and Staff
Staff
Entity class representing a Staff (Admin) actor.
SystemConfig
Boundary class providing a User Interface for Staff to configure system settings
Ticket
Represents a Ticket in the system
Transaction
Represents a Transaction in the system
